title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8187-1.6 - Stipulation of facts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8187-1.6 - Stipulation of facts

State Regulations

The parties may, by agreement, stipulate as to any facts
not in dispute in any adjudicatory proceeding, provided that such stipulation
is incorporated into the stenographic record of the hearing or subscribed in
writing and filed with the hearing officer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8187-1.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
